title: YMusic Android
notes:
Version v3.0.0

Update via:

  • Revamp UI/UX for your best music experience
  • Add play video and subtitle feature
  • Add new downloader and in-app converter, allow you download mp3 without installing Media Converter app
  • Enhancement background playback
  • Add option to play single song
  • Add feature create playlist from queue
  • Add new login feature, now your favorite music videos and recommendation from YouTube will show up in YMusic
  • Now you can see all your playlist after login, include saved playlist under My channel - Playlists
  • Allow browsing YouTube channel/playlist out of the box
  • Allow subscribe/unsubscribe to channel and playlist
  • Remove smart playlist feature
  • Add new local playlists: Last added, History, Top Tracks
  • Add AMOLED theme
  • x2 faster older version

title: YMusic Android
notes:
Version v2.4.7

  • Fix "couldn't parse window setting"
  • Fix youtube music album not working
  • Fix can't get account playlist (v2.4.6)

title: YMusic Android
notes:
Version 2.4.4

  • Add Features:
    • Set playback speed
    • Share YouTube link
    • Share local music file
  • Update: Load all YouTube playlist of your account instead of limited at 50 items.
  • Fix crash on startup (android 7.0)

title: YMusic Android
notes:
Version 2.4.1

  • Fix load Popular videos error
  • Fix play video via share intent not working sometime
  • Update some icons
